word: She has the same service to do for the Master that she had when she addressed the people of Battle Creek years ago. She receives lessons from the same Instructor. The directions given her are, "Write the messages that I give you, that the people may have them." These messages have been written as God has given them to me.--Letter 39, 1905, pp. 1, 2. (To Brother and Sister Belden, January 30, 1905.)
